title: Solo Que Emblem
body: I never really ever play with anyone else in ranked... like maybe 10 games in total out of the over 300 games I have. I've also not played with anyone recently but I got a dynamic que emblem instead of solo que emblem so how do I fix this?

replies.body: The [Ranked Emblem](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/earn-ranked-emblems-starting-today) will update based on your last 25 wins, and vast majority of your premade size.  I looked into this for you and it does look like a majority of your wins were played solo.  It looks like your account has already updated to reflect the Solo emblem!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Km9BEEB4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-07T18:34:34.681+0000)
>
> The [Ranked Emblem](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/earn-ranked-emblems-starting-today) will update based on your last 25 wins, and vast majority of your premade size.  I looked into this for you and it does look like a majority of your wins were played solo.  It looks like your account has already updated to reflect the Solo emblem!

Yes it recently changed to solo which I was quite happy about! But thank you so much for replying its so good to know Riot does notice me XD
But I have NOT played with ANYONE else in the same que as me in MONTHS. Not since the beginning of the season!

Emblems activated on your recent wins, not matches played. You likely won more games with a group of players than solo which is why you were granted the Dynamic emblem. Win 25 games or so on your own and you'll be awarded the solo emblem.
